channel.title: CVE Feed for Max Foundry -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Max Foundry -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-36346|2024-08-03T10:00:04.265Z -- max%20foundry -- maxbuttons%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Multiple Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerabilities in Max Foundry MaxButtons plugin <= 9.2 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-41634|2024-08-03T12:49:43.479Z -- max%20foundry -- media%20library%20folders%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Media Library Folders plugin <= 7.1.1 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-25603|2024-08-03T04:42:50.309Z -- max%20foundry -- maxgalleria%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated (author or higher user role) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability discovered in MaxGalleria WordPress plugin (versions 6.2.5).

item.title: CVE-2022-38703|2024-08-03T11:02:14.466Z -- max%20foundry -- wordpress%20button%20plugin%20maxbuttons%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Max Foundry Button Plugin MaxButtons plugin <= 9.2 at WordPress

item.title: CVE-2024-31287|2024-07-08T18:32:20.164Z -- max%20foundry -- media%20library%20folders
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Max Foundry Media Library Folders.This issue affects Media Library Folders: from n/a through 8.1.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-31287|2024-04-10T16:07:51.605Z -- max%20foundry -- media%20library%20folders
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Max Foundry Media Library Folders.This issue affects Media Library Folders: from n/a through 8.1.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-30486|2024-06-07T18:24:11.357Z -- max%20foundry -- media%20library%20folders
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Max Foundry Media Library Folders.This issue affects Media Library Folders: from n/a through 8.1.7.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Max Foundry Media Library Folders.This issue affects Media Library Folders: from n/a through 8.1.7.
